summary.description: LIMS Tools is an integrated laboratory information and management system (LIMS) for our high-throughput TaqMan?-based SNP genotyping platform. Three new client tools (ProjectManager, AssayManager, OrderTool) for our LIMS improve quality control and workflow management. The programs support organizing multiple genotyping experiments as projects, managing reagents with barcodes, and automation of assay ordering.
summary.name: LIMS Tools
